Models¶

List of database models (MySQL & MongoDb) for languages app.

class languages.models.Language(*args, **kwargs)¶

Model to define various languages available in the form. English is included by default, so do not make entry for english.

Table collation: utf8_*
ALTER TABLE languages_language CONVERT TO CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci;

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

clean()¶

Clean and validation method.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

save(*args, **kwargs)¶

Pre save method for this model.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

class languages.models.Translation(*args, **values)¶

Model to define various sentences and their translation to different kind of languages as define in languages.models.Language model.

Note

When adding new field, update the following code area as well: 1. languages.view.save_translation()

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

classmethod post_save(sender, document, **kwargs)¶

Routine to execute after the translation has been saved.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

save(complete_save=True, *args, **kwargs)¶

Pre save method for this model.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh
